function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of web-based platform for PFA during COVID-19","Impact":"Potential risk of ineffective delivery of psychological first aid","Mitigation":"Ensure proper training and supervision for PFA providers using the web platform","Technologies":"Web chat portal, virtual group supervision","People":"General public, students in UMS","Owner":"Hospital Mesra Bukit Padang, UMS mental health team"},{"Description":"Taskshifting UC-19 skills to pre-clinical medical students","Impact":"Risk of inadequate training and expertise in managing PFA hotlines","Mitigation":"Provide comprehensive training and support to ensure effective PFA delivery","Technologies":"Training programs, supervision protocols","People":"Pre-clinical medical students, PFA hotline users","Owner":"Hospital Mesra Bukit Padang, UMS mental health team"},{"Description":"Increased levels of anxiety in students due to movement restriction order","Impact":"Potential for worsening mental health and well-being of students","Mitigation":"Offer comprehensive support, guidance, and resources to address student anxiety","Technologies":"Online platforms, virtual counseling, mental health resources","People":"Students in UMS","Owner":"UMS mental health team"}]}
